# Diagrams and Media

This document demonstrates Quarto's support for diagrams, equations, videos, and multimedia content.

## Mermaid Diagrams

### Flowchart {#fig-flowchart}

```{mermaid}
flowchart TD
    A[Start] --> B{Decision}
    B -->|Yes| C[Process A]
    B -->|No| D[Process B]
    C --> E[End]
    D --> E
    E --> F[Done]
```

Caption: Example flowchart diagram

### Sequence Diagram {#fig-sequence}

```{mermaid}
sequenceDiagram
    participant User
    participant Browser
    participant Server

    User->>Browser: Click button
    Browser->>Server: Send request
    Server->>Server: Process data
    Server-->>Browser: Return response
    Browser->>Browser: Update DOM
    Browser-->>User: Show result
```

Caption: Client-server interaction sequence

### State Diagram {#fig-state}

```{mermaid}
stateDiagram-v2
    [*] --> Idle
    Idle --> Loading: load()
    Loading --> Processing: process()
    Processing --> Idle: complete()
    Processing --> Error: error()
    Error --> Idle: retry()
    Idle --> [*]
```

Caption: State machine diagram

### Class Diagram

```{mermaid}
classDiagram
    class Animal {
        +String name
        +Int age
        +makeSound()
    }

    class Dog {
        +bark()
    }

    class Cat {
        +meow()
    }

    Animal <|-- Dog
    Animal <|-- Cat
```

Caption: Class inheritance diagram

### Gantt Chart

```{mermaid}
gantt
    title Project Timeline
    dateFormat YYYY-MM-DD

    section Planning
    Requirements :req, 2024-01-01, 30d
    Design :des, after req, 30d

    section Development
    Frontend :front, 2024-02-15, 45d
    Backend :back, 2024-02-15, 60d

    section Testing
    Testing :test, after front back, 30d

    section Deployment
    Release :rel, after test, 7d
```

Caption: Project timeline using Gantt chart

### Pie Chart

```{mermaid}
pie title Browser Market Share
    "Chrome": 65
    "Safari": 20
    "Firefox": 10
    "Others": 5
```

Caption: Market share distribution

## Graphviz Diagrams

### Simple DOT Graph

```{dot}
digraph {
    rankdir=LR;
    node [shape=box];

    A [label="Start"];
    B [label="Process"];
    C [label="Decision"];
    D [label="Action 1"];
    E [label="Action 2"];
    F [label="End"];

    A -> B -> C;
    C -> D [label="Yes"];
    C -> E [label="No"];
    D -> F;
    E -> F;
}
```

Caption: Graphviz flowchart

### Network Diagram

```{dot}
digraph Network {
    node [shape=circle];

    Router [label="Router", shape=box];
    PC1 [label="PC 1"];
    PC2 [label="PC 2"];
    Printer [label="Printer"];
    Server [label="Server"];

    Router -> PC1;
    Router -> PC2;
    Router -> Printer;
    Router -> Server;
}
```

Caption: Network topology diagram

## Equations

### Inline Equations

The equation $\sum_{i=1}^{n} i = \frac{n(n+1)}{2}$ is a fundamental formula.

### Display Equations

$$
\int_{-\infty}^{\infty} e^{-x^2} dx = \sqrt{\pi}
$$

### Numbered Equations

$$
\mathcal{L} = -\frac{1}{4}F_{\mu\nu}F^{\mu\nu} - \frac{1}{2}(\partial_\mu \phi)^2 - V(\phi)
$$ {#eq-lagrangian}

Reference: @eq-lagrangian (Lagrangian density)

### Multi-line Equations

$$
\begin{align}
f(x) &= x^2 + 2x + 1 \\
     &= (x+1)^2
\end{align}
$$

### Include External File

The `include` shortcode can include content from another markdown file:


## Diagrams and Media in Documents

Quarto supports:
- Mermaid diagrams (flowcharts, sequences, state, class, gantt, pie)
- Graphviz diagrams (DOT format)
- Mathematical equations (LaTeX)
- Video embedding (YouTube, Vimeo, local files)
- Keyboard shortcode references
- Placeholder content generation
- File inclusion for modularity
:::

## Advanced Diagram Features

### Styling and Colors in Mermaid

```{mermaid}
flowchart TD
    A[Start]:::startStyle
    B{Decision}
    C[Success]:::successStyle
    D[Failure]:::errorStyle

    A --> B
    B -->|Pass| C
    B -->|Fail| D

    classDef startStyle fill:#90EE90
    classDef successStyle fill:#87CEEB
    classDef errorStyle fill:#FFB6C6
```

Caption: Styled flowchart with custom colors

## Summary

This document demonstrates Quarto's comprehensive support for:

- **Mermaid diagrams**: Flowcharts, sequence, state, class, gantt, pie charts
- **Graphviz diagrams**: Network topology, complex graphs
- **Mathematical equations**: Inline and display, with numbering
- **Video embedding**: YouTube, Vimeo, local video files
- **Dynamic content**: Keyboard shortcuts, placeholders, text generation
- **File inclusion**: Modular content and code reuse
- **Styling**: Custom colors and appearance for diagrams

All of these elements are editable through the Quarto Review extension!
